name: Factotum (itch) (Whare Mātoro (Otago Games Space))
description:
A 3D puzzle game where you play as the scientist creator of ‘Jambo the All-terrain robot’. Work together to escape the hazardous facility from which he was created! 

Created in their second year of the Bachelor of Communication Design at Otago Polytech by Hamish Cadzow, Harri Jenkins, Olly Holtham and Anthony Lloyd.
